metadata.title: CVE-2023-6560 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds memory access flaw was found in the io_uring SQ/CQ ringsfunctionality in the Linux kernel. This issue could allow a local user tocrash the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
